item.title: LaTeX + Unicode â†’ XeTeX
item.description: I’m co-organizing a scientific meeting at the end of May. The abstracts are all in. We get them in an Excel file, and I was working on a Perl script to parse the file to create a LaTeX file with the abstracts, so we could have nicely formatted versions for review. (I’m using Spreadsheet:XLSX for the first time; it’s really easy. Why have I always converted Excel files to CSV before parsing them?
